alchemist_lab_backdoor_key.name: Alchemist's Lab Key
desc: This iron key feels freezing to the touch and seems to suck in all the heat around it.

keep_vault_key.name: Caranae Vault Key
desc: This shiny brass key has several small wards cut into the bit and the bow is embossed with the Garraves' arms.

keep_skeleton_key.Name: Caranae Guards' Skeleton Key
desc: This key has a very particular bit, made to fit all the locks in the keep. Someone's getting fired.

crypt_puzzle_green_gem.Name: Eye of Envy
desc: You see a gem that has a deep green color, when you hold it to the light it creates intoxicating patterns on the walls.
As you gaze into its depths you become increasingly more possessive of it.

crypt_puzzle_red_gem.name: Eye of Wrath
desc: You see an opaque red gem. Despite its polished sides, the gem will not reflect light, making you increasingly infuriated every
time you look at it, like you want to crush it under your boot.

crypt_puzzle_blue_gem.name: Eye of Despair
desc: You hold a blue gem that you can see right through, tinting everything in a blue color. You can swear that things look different
through this gem, almost as if you can see a world of your desire through the gem. Shortly after looking through it, you become
disgusted with yourself, and soon after you are utterly depressed.
